name: My Super Sweet Prom Mitzvah
tagline: Repository of tools for throwing open source parties that are a combination of Sweet Sixteens, Proms, and Bar/Bat Mitzvahs.
body:
#Mission Statement

To create a repository of tools for throwing open source parties that are a combination of Sweet Sixteens, Proms, and Bar/Bat Mitzvahs. 

##History 
 
My Super Sweet Prom Mitzvah was first discussed at a 2012 summer lunch eaten at White Horse Tavern in Allston, MA. 

##Contributors

* Sam Siskind - [Blog](http://samueledwardsiskind.com/)
* Nelson Joyce - [Blog](http://gnelsonj.com/)
